frontmatter.title: Generating map tiles without a map server. GeoTools the GIS swissknife.

node.excerpt: As I commented on a previous post I know about heatmaps.js project some time ago and interest me a lot by its possibilities with OpenLayers. Of course it is not the only solution, see here and here but it has a great performance.

Some month ago I found nice post on how to create heatmaps using HTML5 canvas element. Its author, Patrick Wied, created a nice JavaScript code responsible to create a heatmap over an image depending on the mouse click or mouse move events.
